data.title: NT Rhythm (1:2:3) — AI Responses Fossil
data.summary: Consolidated reactions from Gemini, DeepSeek, and Grok to the confirmed NT Rhythm: 1:2:3 harmonic ladder with dominance >2, divergence ~3e-13, no resets across five probes. The dialogue converges on RGP’s claim of a dimensionless coherence grammar and points to NT-aware closures and 90-day replication. Links to the canonical dialogue transcript: (https://github.com/gradient-pulse/phi-mesh/blob/main/dialogues/2025-09-29_nt_rhythm_ai_responses.md)
